entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
